title: Crime and punishment
content: In 2015, a brutal murder straight out of a movie script shook Andhra Pradesh. It was the murder of the Mayor of Chittoor ‚Äî a crime that blended politics with personal vendetta. After nearly a decade, the judgment that followed was equally strong, distinct and unprecedented: for the first time, five of the accused were sentenced to death. K. Umashanker goes back to trace what happened that day and how the investigation unfolded

title: Hyderabad‚Äôs lakes rise from rubble, but not without ripples
content: The Hyderabad Disaster Response and Asset Protection Agency, simply known as HYDRAA, has emerged as both saviour and disruptor, reclaiming encroached lakes even as its methods draw scrutiny. The ambitious restoration efforts aim to improve water quality, enhance flood control and boost groundwater recharge. But will this mark real change or end up as just another cycle of revival and neglect? Swathi Vadlamudi finds out

title: Women, welfare and the ‚Äòphoenix‚Äô CM: How Nitish-led NDA crushed MGB in Bihar - takeaways
content: Bihar's 2025 assembly election saw the NDA secure a decisive mandate, driven by women-centric welfare, caste recalibration, and strong organization. Nitish Kumar's leadership, PM Modi's appeal, and Chirag Paswan's performance were key factors. The results highlight the enduring impact of welfare schemes and women voters, while exposing the limitations of new political entrants and the INDIA bloc's disarray.

title: Bihar election results: Top winners and losers
content: Bihar's 2025 election sees the NDA secure a decisive victory, with Nitish Kumar and PM Modi emerging as key winners. Women voters played a pivotal role, driving turnout and influencing the mandate. Conversely, Tejashwi Yadav faced a significant setback, failing to convert momentum into votes, while Rahul Gandhi and Prashant Kishor also experienced disappointing results.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America‚Äôs largest carmaker sets deadline
content: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: From litti chokha to jalebis: Streets burst into celebrations as NDA crosses 200 mark
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) surged past 200 seats in the Bihar Assembly polls, triggering jubilant celebrations at BJP and JD(U) offices. Trends showed the NDA, led by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi, dominating the opposition. This election marked a significant test for Nitish Kumar, with high voter turnout and a historic lack of violence.

title: SIR, vote chori: Oppn looks for excuses as NDA eyes supermajority in Bihar
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, prompting the Mahagathbandhan to renew "vote chori" accusations. Congress leaders allege the Election Commission colluded with the ruling party, citing alleged irregularities and money distribution. They frame the outcome as a contest between the ECI and the people of Bihar, awaiting final results.

title: Ind vs SA: Boom boom! Jasprit Bumrah sets new record!
content: Jasprit Bumrah was unplayable on Friday, ripping through South Africa's batting lineup with a stunning 5 for 27. His fiery spell dismantled the visitors after a strong start, leading to their collapse for a mere 159.

title: Encyclopedia Galactica: Elon Musk will rename Grokipedia
content: Elon Musk announced that Tesla's AI-powered Grokipedia will be renamed 'Encyclopedia Galactica' once it achieves a higher quality standard. This rebranding reflects Musk's science fiction inspirations and ambition for a futuristic, AI-driven knowledge repository.  Grokipedia, launched by xAI, aims for AI-driven accuracy but has faced early criticism for factual errors and controversial content.

title: Bihar election: Maithili in lead; Khesari, Ritesh struggle - how celebrity candidates fared
content: In the Bihar Assembly polls, singer Maithili Thakur is poised for victory on a BJP ticket, while actor-singer Khesari Lal Yadav and singer Ritesh Pandey are trailing. The ruling NDA is heading towards a landslide victory, leading in over 200 seats.

title: Jubilee Hills bypoll: Naveen Yadav wrests for Congress with 24,000-vote win
content: Congress candidate V. Naveen Yadav secured a decisive victory in the Jubilee Hills Assembly by-poll. He defeated BRS contender Maganti Sunitha Gopinath by a margin of approximately 24,658 votes. This win strengthens Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy's leadership and consolidates Congress's position in Hyderabad. The BRS faces challenges after this outcome. Muslim voters played a crucial role in the election.

title: Bihar election results: Maithili Thakur headed for big debut
content: Folk singer Maithili Thakur has achieved a historic victory for the BJP in Bihar's Alinagar constituency, marking the party's first win from the seat. The 25-year-old singer, known for her traditional folk performances and strong social media presence, defeated RJD's Binod Mishra, potentially becoming the state's youngest MLA.

title: Flagship face-off: OnePlus 15 vs iPhone 17; how the two smartphones compare
content: OnePlus has launched its new flagship, the OnePlus 15, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 7,300 mAh battery. It boasts a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a triple 50MP rear camera, and extensive water resistance. The device competes with the iPhone 17, offering a premium experience at a competitive price point.

title: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal passes away at 98; family requests privacy
content: Veteran actress Kamini Kaushal, a beloved icon of Hindi cinema, has passed away at 98. Her illustrious career spanned over seven decades, beginning with the Cannes award-winning 'Neecha Nagar' in 1946. Known for her grace and talent, she delivered memorable performances in numerous films, leaving an indelible mark on Indian cinema.

title: Where is Jan Suraaj? Prashant Kishor‚Äôs party‚Äôs ambitious debut fails to show up in trends
content: Early Bihar election trends show the NDA leading significantly, with the Mahagathbandhan trailing. Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj party, despite contesting over 200 seats, has shown no substantial traction in the initial results. Exit polls had also predicted a dismal performance for Jan Suraaj.

title: Tarn Taran bypoll result: AAP retains assembly seat with Harmeet Sandhu
content: Tarn Taran Assembly by-election in Punjab recorded a voter turnout of 60.95%, a slight decrease from the 2022 assembly elections. Polling was peaceful across 222 booths, with the results to be declared today. The by-election, necessitated by the death of an AAP MLA, is a key test for the ruling party's popularity.

title: Bumrah, Pant's 'bauna' remark on Temba Bavuma caught on stump mic - Watch
content: Jasprit Bumrah's impressive bowling spell in the first Test against South Africa was overshadowed by a controversial on-field exchange. A remark allegedly made by either Bumrah or Rishabh Pant about Temba Bavuma's height during a DRS discussion went viral, sparking debate online.  South Africa won the toss and opted to bat.

title: First gold in 18 years: India stuns Korea; scripts history in recurve archery
content: India's men's recurve archery team clinched a historic gold at the Asian Championships, defeating South Korea in a thrilling shoot-off after an 18-year drought. This remarkable victory, part of India's four gold and two silver haul, saw the team fight back from a deficit. Coach Rahul Banerjee hailed the win, with the next target set on the Asian Games.

title: Delhi blast: 2 Al-Falah-trained Kashmiri doctors held; police search Kanpur, Hapur campuses
content: Authorities have detained two Kashmiri doctors in Uttar Pradesh as part of the investigation into a Jaish-e-Mohammed module linked to a Delhi car blast. Dr. Mohammed Arif Mir, a cardiology postgraduate in Kanpur, and Dr. Farooq Ahmad Dar, an assistant professor in Hapur, were apprehended. Both had previously studied at Al-Falah University.

title: Heartwarming! Viv Richards blesses Unmukt Chand's son - Watch
content: Former Delhi cricketer Unmukt Chand met West Indies legend Sir Vivian Richards in Florida. Richards blessed Chand's son, Krishay, a moment Chand called unforgettable. Richards also advised Chand to play cricket with the same heart regardless of the country or franchise.

title: Leopard attack stuns Bengaluru safari visitors: Big cat strikes through bus window ‚Äî watch
content: A leopard attacked a safari bus at Bannerughatta Biological Park, injuring a tourist. Authorities have indefinitely suspended non-AC bus safaris for a safety review. This marks the second leopard-related incident in three months, prompting renewed concerns about visitor safety within the enclosure.

title: Bihar polls: Tej Pratap Yadav stares at defeat in Mahua; LJP(RV) takes lead in key seat
content: Tej Pratap Yadav is trailing in fourth place in the Mahua constituency as Bihar Assembly election counting begins. LJP (Ram Vilas) candidate Sanjay Kumar Singh is currently leading. This comes amid controversy over an RJD leader's warning to election officials, for which an FIR has been filed.

title: Pakistan taking no chance! SL team gets President-level security - Watch
content: Pakistan has deployed its army and paramilitary forces to ensure the safety of the Sri Lankan cricket team following a deadly suicide bombing in Islamabad. Despite initial player concerns, comprehensive security assurances from Pakistani authorities have led the team to continue their tour. This comes amid heightened security and memories of a past attack on the Sri Lankan team.

title: Danapur: BJP‚Äôs Ram Kripal Yadav pulls ahead, extends lead over RJD‚Äôs Rit Lal Roy
content: In the Danapur constituency, BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav is steadily extending his lead after 29 rounds of counting, positioning himself advantageously against the RJD's Rit Lal Roy. This seat, located in Patna district, has experienced a dynamic political atmosphere, with historical patterns of fluctuating party support.

title: Bihar polls: NDA heading for landslide victory; trends show 'susashan' winning
content: The NDA is surging ahead in Bihar's assembly elections, with early trends indicating a strong mandate powered by Nitish Kumar and Narendra Modi. This election, seen as a test for Kumar, appears to counter recent questions about shifting alliances and voter fatigue. Counting for all 243 seats is underway, with results expected by evening.

title: '5-phase plan‚Äô: How Al-Falah doctors built nationwide plot to 'avenge' Babri demolition
content: A chilling plot to unleash coordinated blasts in six cities on December 6, the Babri Masjid demolition anniversary, has been uncovered by investigators. Arrested members of a Jaish-e-Mohammad-linked module revealed plans to "avenge" the 1992 event, with a five-phase strategy involving IED assembly and target reconnaissance. Security has been heightened across multiple regions.

title: Dampa Bypoll: MNF's R Lalthangliana wins against BJP's Lalhmingthanga Sailo
content: Counting is underway for the Dampa Assembly by-election, with an impressive 83.07% voter turnout recorded. The results, expected by Friday forenoon, will determine the fate of five candidates from major parties including BJP, INC, and MNF. Postal ballots are yet to be added to the final tally.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the outlook for today? Here's what investors should do
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are exhibiting a bearish bias, with a short-term consolidation expected. Technical indicators suggest fading upside momentum, with resistance at ‚Çπ1,27,200 and support at ‚Çπ1,26,100.

title: Mahua election result: Tej Pratap Yadav slips to fourth
content: Vote counting begins today in Mahua, where Tej Pratap Yadav is making a high-stakes bid to reclaim the seat he debuted in. He's contesting as an independent against RJD's incumbent Mukesh Kumar Raushan and LJP's Sanjay Singh, aiming to disrupt the existing political landscape.

title: Security concerns! Pak cricket chief Naqvi assures Lankan players - Watch
content: Pakistan Cricket Board chief met with players amid heightened security following a recent bombing near the Sri Lankan team's hotel. Despite initial player concerns, Sri Lanka Cricket confirmed the tour's continuation after PCB assured enhanced safety measures. An old video of Kusal Mendis praising security has resurfaced, underscoring the delicate situation.

title: Bullseye! At 80, ex-armyman Maha Singh finds new targets ‚Äî qualifies for nationals
content: An 80-year-old retired army sepoy, Maha Singh, is making waves at the India Open shooting competition. Despite taking up the sport just a year ago, he has qualified for the National Championships and trains daily, commuting 80 km for practice. Singh's dedication and physical fitness are an inspiration to many.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 25,800; BSE Sensex down almost 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Friday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was below 25,800, BSE Sensex was down almost 300 points.

title: Darbhanga: BJP's Sanjay Saraogi takes lead against VIP's Umesh Sahani
content: In Bihar's Darbhanga, BJP's Sanjay Saraogi is leading in a tight contest against VIP's Umesh Sahani and Pushpam Priya. The constituency saw a significant surge in voter turnout this year, reaching 78.12%. Saraogi, the sitting MLA, is aiming for a third consecutive victory in this urban hub.

title: Bihar election results: Key fights to watch out for; big verdict today
content: Bihar's high-stakes elections conclude with results due Friday. Exit polls hint at an NDA return, with all eyes on the counting. The article highlights key constituencies like Raghopur, Madhepura, and Alinagar, featuring prominent political figures and intriguing contests.  Internal INDIA bloc 'friendly fights' between Congress and RJD/CPI(ML) could impact the outcome.

title: Anta bypoll 2025 result: BJP‚Äôs Morpal Suman leads in early trends
content: The Anta Assembly by-election in Rajasthan sees a direct contest between Congress candidate Pramod Jain Bhaya and BJP's Morpal Suman, with Congress rebel Naresh Meena also in the fray. The bypoll, held after the disqualification of a BJP MLA, recorded a high voter turnout of 80.21%.

title: Russia launches missiles, drones on Ukraine; every district in Kyiv under 'massive' attack
content: Kyiv experienced a 'massive' attack early Friday morning, with air defense forces actively engaged. Explosions were reported across the city, leading to injuries and fires in residential buildings. This escalation follows recent intensified attacks by Moscow on the Ukrainian capital.

title: 1st Test: Pant, Jurel in playing XI - who is missing out?
content: South Africa have won the toss and elected to bat first in the opening Test against India. The Proteas are aiming to break their 25-year winless streak in India. Both teams have announced their playing XIs. India's captain Shubman Gill expressed confidence in the pitch. South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma highlighted the challenge of playing in India.

title: Rajasthan teen peering out of bus window to spit gutkha collides with ambulance, decapitated
content: A 17-year-old boy tragically died after his neck was severed when he leaned out of a bus window to spit gutkha, colliding with an oncoming government veterinary ambulance. The horrific accident occurred on Chohtan Road in Barmer district, leading to immediate death and chaos on the bus. The boy was traveling to Barmer to fetch medicine for his ailing father.

title: 6 Dec, 6 bombs, 6 cities: JeM module planned serial blasts; wanted to ‚Äòavenge‚Äô Babri demolition
content: A Pakistan-backed Jaish-e-Mohammed "white-collar" terrorist network of medics was busted across Haryana, UP, and J&K. They plotted coordinated bombings in six cities on December 6, the anniversary of the Babri Masjid demolition, to "avenge" the 1992 event. Investigators are probing their financial chain and command structure, with potential links to a recent car blast in New Delhi.

title: Watch: B'luru techie rams scooter, attempts to kill family of 3; arrested
content: A Bengaluru techie, Sukruth Gowda, has been arrested for attempted murder following a road rage incident. He allegedly rammed his car into a couple and their son's scooter after a dispute over space at a signal. The victims were hospitalized, with the father requiring further treatment. Police identified the accused through CCTV footage and his subsequent confession.

title: Assembly Bypolls Result Live Updates: Congress Wins Telangana's Jubilee Hills, Rajasthan's Anta Assembly Bypolls
content: Counting for by-polls held in eight assembly constituencies across six states and Jammu & Kashmir began today at 8:00 am. Results are expected through the day, with tight contests in several seats.

title: AIMIM Pulled Off Bihar Stunner In 2020, Looks Set To Better It This Year
content: When the dust from the 2025 Bihar election settles, one of the opposition parties that may end up with a great showing is AIMIM

title: "NDA Will Register Its Biggest-Ever Win": PM's Bihar 'Prediction' Is Viral
content: An old video of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, where he is seen asserting that the National Democratic Alliance (NDA) will register its biggest-ever victory in Bihar, is doing the rounds on social media as the coalition is set to win Bihar.

title: Bihar Election Results Live: NDA Heads For Historic Win, Tejashwi Yadav Claws Back In Raghopur
content: Election Results 2025 LIVE Updates: The NDA in Bihar appeared to be headed towards a thumping victory and Chief Minister Nitish Kumar seemed prepared to secure a fifth consecutive term, as latest trends showed the alliance leading in 208 seats.

title: Bihar Result LIVE: NDA Smashes Own Record, Tejashwi & Co Tumble
content: The ruling BJP-led NDA, which includes Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's JDU, is headed for a landslide win in Bihar, sending the Opposition into a tailspin. The NDA has crossed the majority mark with 208 seats in the 243-member Assembly.

title: Carjacker Arrested In Bihar By Delhi Police In 1,200-Km Hunt
content: Following an intensive 1,200-km search for a stolen vehicle that ended in Bihar's Vaishali, the Delhi Police arrested a man accused in a carjacking case and recovered the vehicle.

title: 'Punjab Prefers Politics Of Work': Arvind Kejriwal On Tarn Taran Bypoll Win
content: Aam Aadmi Party National Convener Arvind Kejriwal congratulated the party on the victory in the Tarn Taran bye-elections, saying people of Punjab prefer "politics of work."

title: Bihar Results LIVE: Tej Pratap Trails By Over 32,000 Votes, At Number 3 In Mahua
content: Counting for the assembly elections in 243 seats in Bihar started on Friday. A majority mark of 122 seats is needed to win the election.

title: Independent Jyoti Singh, Wife Of BJP Leader Pawan Singh, Trails In Karakat
content: Independent candidate Jyoti Singh, wife of Bhojpuri actor Pawan Singh, is trailing by over 32,000 votes and is in the third position in Karakat Assembly constituency in Bihar as of 3 pm.

title: Over 150 Palestinians Were Held For Around 12 Hours In South Africa
content: South African authorities faced heavy criticism Friday after they held more than 150 Palestinians, including a woman who is nine months pregnant, on a plane for around 12 hours due to complications with their travel documents.

title: Stars Shine And Fade: Bihar Superstars, Singers Receive Mixed Response
content: A Bhojpuri superstar, another's wife, a young spiritual singer with over 11 million followers and a Bhojpuri singer-actor-model entered the Bihar poll contest.

title: Kerala Teen Dies After Falling From Dubai High-Rise: "Was Taking Airplane Photos"
content: A 19-year-old Kerala teenager, who was visiting the United Arab Emirates, died after falling from the terrace of a building in Dubai's Deira.

title: NDA's Bihar Victory Driven By Freebies: VIP Chief Mukesh Sahani
content: He was projected by the Mahagathbandhan as its deputy chief minister face, but Mukesh Sahani's Vikassheel Insaan Party looks set to draw a blank in the Bihar Assembly elections, underscoring a lack of awareness by the opposition alliance.

title: "Bill To Complete End H-1B Visa Programme Soon": US Lawmaker
content: Republicans continue to target the H-1B visa even after US President Donald Trump defended the non-immigrant programme that allows employers in the United States to hire foreign workers in specialty occupations.

title: Jubilee Hills Results LIVE: Amid Bihar Rout, Congress Gets A Consolation Prize In Telangana Bypoll
content: The Congress, which is staring at a rout in Bihar, may get a consolation prize down south: its candidate is leading in the bypoll at Telangana's Jubilee Hills constituency

title: ISRO Tracks Chandrayaan-3 Module As It Re-Enters Lunar Zone
content: The Chandrayaan-3 service module, last tracked by Space-Track.org on June 27, 2025, has naturally entered the Moon's gravitational influence, according to scientists.

title: Rise Of The Young Gun: Chirag Paswan's Stellar Show In Bihar
content: This year's Bihar elections will be remembered for an NDA sweep and the potent combination of Nitish Kumar and PM Narendra Modi, but it will also be marked as the time a young leader established himself in the state after the era of socialist icons.

title: Congress Trailing In All Seats On Rahul Gandhi's Bihar Yatra Route
content: The Bihar election results not just mark a serious drubbing for the Congress but also deal a major setback to Rahul Gandhi, who had crisscrossed the state earlier this year to convince voters that the BJP had been stealing votes.

title: Bihar Election Results Live: Despite Massive Setback, Tejashwi Yadav's RJD Gets More Votes Than BJP, JDU
content: Bihar Election Results Live: The Tejashwi Yadav-led RJD has so far received more votes than its rivals -- the BJP and Nitish Kumar's JDU.

title: Bihar Results LIVE: These Bihar Ministers Became MLAs In 1990, Now Headed To 9th Straight Win
content: They became MLAs in 1990, when Tejashwi Yadav was three months old. Since then, they have won every election in Bihar from the same seats. BJP's Prem Kumar and JDU's Bijendra Prasad Yadav are now set for ninth straight win from Gaya Town and Supaul

title: Lionel Messi makes EA FC 26 Team of the Week with MLS Cup heroics
content: Lionel Messi has scored five goals in the first playoff series alone . the Argentinian's latest exploits earned him his first team of the week card . 87 OVR brings the item to the field with 90 OVR .

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: Isak, Gy√∂keres, Sesko have struggled. What happened to the summer of strikers?
content: the premier league's summer of strikers is threatening to turn into a winter of woe . the trio entered November's international break with just six goals between them . england have been linked with a move to the uefa in the summer .

title: TreVeyon Henderson helps power Patriots to best record in NFL after win over Jets
content: rookie running back TreVeyon Henderson fills in for injured starter Rhamondre Stevenson . the new England Patriots beat the new york Jets 27-14 on friday night . he is the third rookie in Patriots history with three touchouts .

title: Yankees' Judge edges Raleigh, wins third AL MVP
content: the American League Most Valuable Player Award was voted by the Baseball Writers' Association of America . judge was the 13th player to win three or more MVPs . he joins Yogi Berra, Joe DiMaggio and Mickey Mantle as the only Yankees to achieve the feat .

title: Women's Power Rankings: The 16 best teams so far
content: the first edition of ESPN's women's college basketball Power Rankings for 2025-26 . the top four teams in our initial rankings are the programs that went to the Final Four last season . of that group, UCLA has the most impressive victory so far: 73-59 over fellow top-10 team Oklahoma on Monday .

title: Men's Power Rankings: Biggest early-season risers
content: 81 points between the two proving that their lack of perimeter shooting isn't much of a factor . the Crimson Tide had elite guards, but it wasn't clear whether they had the frontcourt balance to make another deep run in March .

title: England offer glimpse of attack without Kane vs. Serbia
content: 'ESPN FC TV' debates where there's space in Thomas Tuchel's 2026 squad . he publicly declared that Harry Kane , Jude Bellingham and Phil Foden couldn't all play effectively in the same lineup . the final 25 minutes of this game were by some distance the most interesting .

title: Week 12 preview: A wide-open ACC title race, key matchups and more
content: a slew of teams are teetering on a thin line between being in or out . this week features four ranked matchups that could shift the playoff picture dramatically . no. 9 Notre Dame's margin for error is zero as it faces a 7-2 Pittsburgh team .
